comments.content:
Unfortunately, a lot of these architectural geometric sans types from the early-to-mid 20th Century haven’t been digitized as fonts. You could try Futura, or Neutraface 2 if you want a close match.

- Lex
yea p22 is pretty spot on. thank you guys very much!
